TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

span.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话令牌存储与会话，以及定义会话; 其他参数相关联的用户例如会话开始和结束时间。A session token stores the of the user that is associated with a session as well as other parameters that define the session; for example the session start and end times. 在被动的情况下，调入(SAM) 创建的会话令牌身份验证管道从表示经过身份验证的用户。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置以创建令牌并将其序列化到 cookie （和进行反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 的令牌）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其配置是实例类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 此 cookie 然后返回到客户端，客户端可以在后续请求显示 cookie，而不是回要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序进行的往返过程。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话使用 WIF 的运作方式的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 会话令牌可以在任何一种引用模式运行，或不。A session token can operate in either reference mode or not. 如果有会话令牌未运行在引用模式下，整个令牌序列化到存储在客户端的会话 cookie。If the session token is not operating in reference mode, the entire token is serialized into the session cookie that is stored on the client. 序列化的会话令牌可能会很大，因此客户端上存储的 cookie 也可以是相当相当大。The serialized session token can be quite large and thus the cookie stored on the client can also be quite sizeable. 在引用模式下，而不是序列化整个会话 cookie 到令牌，该令牌存储在会话安全令牌缓存并仅用于生成密钥从缓存中检索令牌所需的信息存储在 cookie 中。In reference mode, rather than serializing the entire session token into the cookie, the token is stored in a session security token cache and only the information used to generate the key necessary to retrieve the token from the cache is stored in the cookie. 这可以极大地降低的 cookie 的大小。This can greatly reduce the size of the cookie. 由派生自类实现会话令牌缓存并由实现缓存键类。The session token cache is implemented by a class derived from and the cache key is implemented by the class. 和属性用在类生成的缓存密钥。The and properties are used in the class to generate the cache key. 属性确定是否会话令牌是否已在引用模式下。The property determines whether the session token is in reference mode or not. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在为每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且通过仅设置偏好会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. 提供使用 WIF 类序列化作为 Ws-secure Conversation 会话令牌``元素。The class provided with WIF serializes the session token as a WS-Secure Conversation `` element.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`null`| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| || 加上属性。 plus the property.| ||`null`| ||包含生成的 128 位对称密钥。Contains a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||| || 加上属性。 plus the property.|

-or- The property of is .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified principal, context ID, context, endpoint, start time, expiration time, and key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId`| ||`endpointId`| ||设置为生成的唯一 id。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||设置的值为属性所确定的那样`ValidFrom`参数。Set to the value of the property as determined by the `ValidFrom` parameter.| ||值属性所确定的那样`ValidTo`参数。The value of the property as determined by the `ValidTo` parameter.| ||`null`| ||包含单个元素，可以是`key`或者，如果`key`是`null`，生成的 128 位对称密钥。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||值`validFrom`参数，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， 。The value of the `validFrom` parameter, or, if `validFrom` is `null`, .| ||`validFrom` 参数的值。The value of the `validFrom` parameter. 如果`validFrom`是`null`的值属性 (由`validFrom`参数) 以及属性。If `validFrom` is `null`, the value of the property (as determined by the `validFrom` parameter) plus the property.|

The session context identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨所有会话令牌，上下文标识符是唯一的。The context identifier is unique across all session tokens. 类都使用的上下文 ID 和密钥的生成来生成中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将为此属性序列化为``的子元素``元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.
The ID of the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果属性是`null`、 会话令牌被处理为全局划分作用域由类。If the property is `null`, the session token is treated as globally scoped by the class. 这会给潜在的安全风险。This can present a potential security risk.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

value.span: 如果 cookie 是持久的;否则为。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，cookie 被编写为持久性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the cookie is written as a persistent cookie. 浏览器关闭之前在过期后，永久 cookie 保持有效。Persistent cookies remain valid after the browser is closed until they expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

value.span: 如果会话模式，则在运行，该令牌否则为。

span.span: if the token is operating in session mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引用模式下，在序列化过程中生成一个简单的项目和与令牌处理程序关联的令牌缓存中存储令牌的材料。In reference mode, a simple artifact is produced during serialization and the token material is stored in the token cache that is associated with the token handler. 令牌缓存是派生自的类的实例。The token cache is an instance of a class that derives from . 对于 Web 场方案中，令牌缓存必须运行跨场中的所有节点。For Web Farm scenarios, the token cache must operate across all nodes in the farm. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在为每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且通过仅设置偏好会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

span.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token

value.span: 密钥生成此令牌中唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for the key generation in this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性内是唯一的会话令牌。The property is unique within a session token. 会话令牌颁发时具有仅上下文 ID，它是可通过访问属性。When a session token is issued it has only a context ID, which is accessible through the property. 续订的会话令牌时，将添加密钥生成。When the session token is renewed, the key generation is added. 类都使用的上下文 ID 和密钥的生成来生成中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将为此属性序列化为``的子元素``元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档方法。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

span.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

value.span: 标识用于序列化此令牌的 Ws-secure Conversation 的版本的 URI。

span.span: The URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类支持 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 和 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3。The base class supports WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 and WS-Secure Conversation 1.3. 对于这些版本的 Ws-secure Conversation Uri 是否"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc"和"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512"分别。The URIs for these versions of WS-Secure Conversation are "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc" and "http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512" respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 默认实现不使用此属性。The default implementation does not use this property. 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥处理该令牌。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.
